籤詩版本二:
Ha pula e telele ea selemo e qala ho na, Rabbit ea Jade le Golden Crow butle-butle lia khanya
Lintho tsa khale lia nyamela 'me tse ncha lia hlaha.. Sheba 'me u kopane le heke ea drakone.
詩意:
Hexagram ena ke letšoao la pula e telele le khanya ea pele.
Ntho e 'ngoe le e 'ngoe e tsamaea joalokaha e reriloe.
解曰: E sirelelitsoe ke melimo le Mabuddha. Ha ho kotsi ea tlokotsi. Leeto e be la kgotso. Kgutla ka hlompho qetellong.
籤詩故事一:
◇ Jiang Taigong o kopana le Morena Wen
Leloko la Zhou. Jiang Shang, lebitso la tlhompho Ziya. Ji people (ba tsoang Xuzhou e Leoatleng la China Bochabela). Lebitso la Botao ke Fei Xiong, ’me baholo-holo ba hae ba ile ba tiisoa ka Lu (lebitso la sebaka), kahoo o boetse o bitsoa Lu Wang.
E le ho qoba linako tse likhathatso tsa Morena Zhou oa Lesika la Shang, o ne a lula pel’a metsi a Leoatle la China Bochabela ’me a tšoasa litlhapi Nōkeng ea Weishui. Sekoti se otlolohile, sepheo sa hae ha se ho tšoasa, empa ke ho ba tonakholo ea khabane.
Morena Wen oa Zhou o ile a utloa hore o bohlale 'me a mo hira e le mosuoe oa hae (tona-kholo). (Ka nako eo o ne a le lilemo li mashome a robeli) Morena Wu oa Leloko la Hamorao la Zhou o ile a hlasela Morena Zhou, a timetsa Lesika la Shang, 'me a theha Leloko la Zhou. Morena Wu a mmitsa Shangfu. Mora oa hae Ding Gong o ile a fuoa tlotla ea Marquis ea Qi.
(Morero oa pale ena: Jiang Taigong, ea neng a emetse ho tšoasa litlhapi ka nako e telele Nōkeng ea Weishui, qetellong o ile a tsoa mathateng ’me a sebelisoa hape ke Morena Wen.)
聖意: Ka tlung, Zhongping ka boeena o rapella mahlohonolo le maruo, ha ho se na tumellano, lenyalo ke ntho e sa reroang. e lahlehetsoe ke thepa, maloetse le mabitla Thabeng ea Xingxing.
古人: Jiang Taigong o kopana le Morena Wen
第X籤: Lotho ea mashome a mabeli a motso o mong
